painted-bedroom-furniture-with-oak-top.Name: COMPACT 3 DRAWER BEDSIDE
painted-bedroom-furniture-with-oak-top.Body:
Whether you choose just a bed, chest, wardrobe or even a full bedroom suite, this
collection will create a beautiful and striking presence in your home.
With a choice of four paint colours - Ivory, Truffl e, White and Plati num,
perfectly complimented by a natural oak top, chrome cup handles and
trumpet knobs.
You can create a warm and comfortable feel to your bedroom, knowing each
piece is individually crafted. Manufactured in the UK, we employ the best
techniques to create solid drawers, dovetailed joints, tongue and groove
backs whilst incorporati ng valued features such as solid pine construction
throughout, solid oak tops and a long-lasting paint finish.

Designed and hand-crafted in the UK, using solid kiln dried Scandinavian Redwood Pine and solid North American White Oak.

Standard 3’ Bookcase
H 1095mm
W 805mm
D 340mm
With adjustable shelves

chunky-oak-painted-bedroom-furniture.Name: 2 OVER 3 CHEST
chunky-oak-painted-bedroom-furniture.Body: This collection is designed with the modern house in mind. The slighter dimensions make the range of dining, occasional and bedroom oak furniture ideal for contemporary living. The outstanding value is not achieved by cutting quality. All drawers feature dovetailed joints and a majority of the range is fully assembled. Some of the pieces need minimal assembly, this allows some of the bigger items such as wardrobes, bed and tables to be delivered more easily.

contemporary-oak-bedroom.Name: Contemporary Oak SINGLE DRESSING TABLE MIRROR
contemporary-oak-bedroom.Body:
With a selection of stylish furniture pieces to suit your home from the bedroom to the dining room, this bold oak furniture range provides both durability and style for your interiors. Boasting traditional design features including dovetail joints to the drawers and solid wood panelling to the cabinet backs and drawer bases. This Oak furniture range is expertly crafted to stand the test of time. With a coating of tough lacquer to enhance the natural beauty of the oak grain, and complemented with brush steel curved handles, this gorgeous range has something to suit every home and is ideal for bringing your décor to life. Whether you're looking to inject some character to the living room, brighten the decor in the kitchen or simply enhance your bedroom, this furniture range has a versatile selection of exquisite pieces to transform every home.

Hand side stitch effect border

Any base colour option as standard from the swatch

Non-turn mattress rotate 180 degrees only

Mattress depth: 10 inch (250mm)

FIRMNESS RATING: medium to firm with a softer feel comfort layer

mattresss.Name: Latex Pillow Top 5000 Mattress
mattresss.Body:
· Soft & gentle stretch fabric cover

· Luxurious box topper with a deep layer of 100% Natural Latex for exceptional comfort

· 100% Natural Latex combines with the advanced pocket spring system to provide excellent underlying support and proper spinal alignment

· Excellent elasticity provides perfect body support to improve blood flow and minimise the risk of back pain and spinal stiffness.

· Unique open cell structure allows continuous air circulation and perfect ventilation through the proper dispersion of body moisture

· Fully encapsulated with Highgrove AdvantEdge® to provide a wider sleep surface with total comfort and support

· Designed as a no-turn mattress - please regularly rotate 180° to extend mattress life and performance

· A wide range of luxury base options available in a choice of colours

metal-beds.Name: Vienna
metal-beds.Body:
The Vienna bed frame is a fantastic combination of contemporary and traditional style.

The straight leg posts and vertical tubing provide a subtle aesthetic contrast to the classical curving chrome top bar, and its tall head and foot end make the Vienna a commanding presence in a modern bedroom. 

The frame has a sprung slatted base for added  comfort  and  an  even  sleeping surface.

metal-beds.Name: Florida Bed
metal-beds.Body:
The Florida metal bed frame is an elegantly designed Victorian style frame.

The decorative detail on the head and footboard make this a great piece for a stylish bedroom. Available in black or Ivory and a wide range of sizes the Florida is the perfect addition to your range.

The frame features a sturdy metal construction and a sprung slatted base to ensure it provides an even and comfortable sleeping surface.

metal-beds.Name: Elizabeth Bed
metal-beds.Body:
Elegance and intricacy have been brought
together in this Victorian Brass effect bed
frame. It’s design and solid construction
make this a popular choice for any classical
bedroom. The high foot end bed frame comes
with two height variations for your mattress
ensuring it caters for all preferences.
The frame has a sprung slatted base for
added comfort and a robustly designed
internal frame which is self supporting and
does not require centre support legs.

stretton.Body:
This beautiful dressing table is the perfect piece be the focal point of your bedroom, creating a stylish and elegant space for getting ready in the mornings, with a large surface area for cosmetics, a mirror and more, plus two drawers for handy storage. It also works well as a small office or student desk.
We offer a matching vanity mirror and stool to complete the piece.

stretton.Name: Quad Robe (LYD036)
stretton.Body: Our Quad wardrobe is the ultimate storage solution for your bedroom. Offering an impressive home for your clothes, shoes and bedding, this robe is sure to deliver on all your storage needs. Featuring two single full length hanging spaces, on either end of the robe, perfect for long garments, along with the option to install the handy second rail halfway down, to make hanging space for shorter clothing. You can also use the base of the robe to hold shoes or storage boxes. The middle 2 door section includes a full width hanging space above two large drawers with ample capacity for bedding, t-shirts or shoes.
